mean_cn: n. 直觉；感觉；感性知识
mean_en: a natural ability or power that makes it possible to know something without any proof or evidence; a feeling that guides a person to act a certain way without fully understanding why
short_phrase: uses his intuition to search for clues
sentence: Her intuition told her that something was wrong.
sentence_trans: 她凭直觉意识到有什么不对劲。
